name: Horror House on Spook St.
description:
Horror House on Spook St. UI 

Horror House on Spook St. is an online multiplayer game where 4-6 players work together to exorcise a possessed house. Each player has a Sanity level and when theirs reaches 0, they're out. Every player has a specific role they must fulfill throughout the game, however, one of these players has been possessed by the House and must do anything to prevent the team from succeeding. Reach the goal and exorcise the House before everyone loses Sanity.

This game is developed solely as a functional UI.

See my UX Design Document below!
